verses.verse: Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD<WH3050>. Sing<WH7891> unto the LORD<WH3068> a new<WH2319> song<WH7892>, and his praise<WH8416> in the congregation<WH6951> of saints<WH2623>. Praise: Heb. Halleluiah
Let Israel<WH3478> rejoice<WH8055> in him that made<WH6213> him: let the children<WH1121> of Zion<WH6726> be joyful<WH1523> in their King<WH4428>.
Let them praise<WH1984> his name<WH8034> in the dance<WH4234>: let them sing praises<WH2167> unto him with the timbrel<WH8596> and harp<WH3658>. in: or, with the pipe
For the LORD<WH3068> taketh pleasure<WH7521> in his people<WH5971>: he will beautify<WH6286> the meek<WH6035> with salvation<WH3444>.
Let the saints<WH2623> be joyful<WH5937> in glory<WH3519>: let them sing aloud<WH7442> upon their beds<WH4904>.
Let the high<WH7319> praises of God<WH410> be in their mouth<WH1627>, and a twoedged<WH6374> sword<WH2719> in their hand<WH3027>; mouth: Heb. throat
To execute<WH6213> vengeance<WH5360> upon the heathen<WH1471>, and punishments<WH8433> upon the people<WH3816>;
To bind<WH631> their kings<WH4428> with chains<WH2131>, and their nobles<WH3513> with fetters<WH3525> of iron<WH1270>;
To execute<WH6213> upon them the judgment<WH4941> written<WH3789>: this honour<WH1926> have all his saints<WH2623>. Praise<WH1984> ye the LORD<WH3050>.
